name: Wyckoff False-Break PriceAction Strategy
description: Trades large-cap U.S. equities on daily bars using Wyckoff accumulation/distribution logic. Longs enter on Springs (false breakdowns) and shorts on Upthrusts (false breakouts) confirmed by a same-day close back in range. Risk per trade is capped at 1 % of equity with initial stops 2 % from entry and max three concurrent positions.
